title: LF support for flex team
body: LF a dedicated support to climb the flex queue ladder, must be a gamer girl ;)

replies.body: I'm a support main, add me :)

"Must be a gamer girl." 

I will not allow you to force me into supp-- Fuck it I've been a support main for six seasons now. 

https://discord.gg/rgXRA6b
Here's my discord if you need it. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
